script_info: Only works in Image2image mode. Use it with the Tile ControlNet to upscale images on a low-end GPU.

parms.name: tile_width
parms.help: The width of the tile to be processed. The larger the tile, the less artifacts will be in the final image. For 2k 512px is usually enough.

parms.name: tile_height
parms.help: The height of the tile to be processed. The larger the tile, the less artifacts will be in the final image. For 2k 512px is usually enough.

parms.name: mask_blur
parms.help: It is blur of masks used in tile masking. Set it to 12-16 on 512-768px tile size. Increase if you see seams.

parms.name: padding
parms.help: How many pixels of neighboring tiles will be taken into account when processing a tile.

parms.name: seams_fix_width
parms.help: Redraw line width. Used only in 'Band pass' mode

parms.name: seams_fix_padding
parms.help: How many pixels of image near seam will be taken into account when processing a tile.

parms.name: upscaler_index
parms.help: Upscale the image before redrawing. Our recommendation - ESRGAN for photorealistic images, R-ESRGAN 4x+ for others.

parms.name: redraw_mode
parms.help: Linear - All tiles processed one by one, column by column, row by row. Chess - All tiles are processed in a checkerboard pattern. Reduces the chance of seam artifacts. None - Disabled redraw. Use it when run generation without seam fix, see visible overlays or artifacts on seams and want to run just seam pass. Don't forget to put upscaled image as the source before.

parms.name: seams_fix_mask_blur
parms.help: It is blur of masks used in tile masking. Set it to 8-16 on 32px padding. Increase when increasing padding.

parms.name: seams_fix_type
parms.help: Do not use it if the image has no visible grid, it adds another redraw pass.

parms.name: target_size_type
parms.help: When set to 'From image2image', it will use the size from SD Dream node.

parms.name: custom_scale
parms.help: Used when target_size_type is 'Scale from image size'
